name: Quest on Dorcas

reviews.text: This is a really well run establishment.
reviews.title: You wont be dissapointed

reviews.text: I stayed here as I was doing a Landmark Forum course not far from this property. (If you are doing one also it will only take you about eight minutes to walk there)
reviews.title: Always a good stay!

description: Superbly located within metres of the Royal Botanic Gardens and adjacent to St Kilda Road, Quest on Dorcas offers sophisticated 4½ star one and two bedroom apartments, just 1.5 kilometres from Melbourne's CBD. It's quiet position is convenient for public transport, nearby cosmopolitan cafes and restaurants of Clarendon Street, and a short walk to the National Gallery of Victoria, Melbourne Sports & Aquatic Centre, Crown Casino and Southgate. All 49 newly refurbished apartments are non-smoking, stylishly appointed and feature separate lounge and dining area, two televisions and balcony. The property boasts a gymnasium, liquor store, cafe, security access and undercover parking.
